Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0942 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
EB Emergency input buffer current capacityCurrent capacity of an emergency input specimen buffer
IB Input buffer current capacityCurrent capacity of a regular input specimen buffer
IC Instrument current processing capacityCurrent processing capacity of the instrument
OB Output buffer current capacityCurrent capacity of an output specimen buffer
TA Current test availabilityCurrent test availability

name: EquipmentStateIndicator
title: equipmentStateIndicator
description: HL7-defined code sytem of cocepts that specify the type of measurement of the state of an automated laboratory instrument. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the INV segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0942 (Equipment State Indicator Type Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.definition: Current capacity of an emergency input specimen buffer
Current capacity of a regular input specimen buffer
Current processing capacity of the instrument
Current capacity of an output specimen buffer
